HERE'S THE STORY

You are a legendary knight, but you are bored.
It's time for you to find some danger so you can feel excitement again.
Enter your name below and see if you can find any.
Maybe you'll find a prince locked away, and some challenges where you have to copy a pattern or find some connections.
But I couldn't possibly say...
